# billingAgreement

**Instance Property**

The localized billing agreement the framework displays to the user prior to payment authorization.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString billingAgreement;
```

## Discussion

This may include additional details about the cancellation period or penalties for late cancellation. This value is optional.

## Describing a deferred payment

- **paymentDescription**: A description of the deferred payment.
- **freeCancellationDate**: The time zone at the destination location of the payment.
- **freeCancellationDateTimeZone**: The time zone at the destination location of the payment.
